name: Let my cat sleep
description:
Helps the cat to complete its sleeping hours. 

Avoid children so that they do not disturb your cat. 

Broccoli scares children. 

Controls: 

PC - Movement 

A - W - S - D or Arrows 

PC - Pick up and drop cat 

Space key 

Mobile - Movement 

swipe - left side of the screen 

Mobile - Pick up and drop cat 

touch - right side of the screen

Playing in Liluo: Let my cat sleep
